descriptors.name: bt_ai_ml_hand_signal_recognition
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - AI/ML Hand Signal Recognition (MLX90640)
descriptors.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers to run image classification machine learning models to detect the hand gestures from image data recorded from a Far Infrared Sensor. The detection is visualized using the OLED and the classification results are written to the VCOM serial port. Additionally, the classification results are transmitted to a connected Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) Client.

properties.value: Capability|Machine\ Learning Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bluetooth_people_counting_ak9753
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - People Counting (AK9753)
descriptors.description: This project aims to implement a people counting application using Silabs development kits and external sensors integrated with the BLE wireless stack.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bt_soc_blinky_sparkfun_thingplus
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC Blinky - SparkFun Thing Plus Matter - MGM240P
descriptors.description: This example application is the Hello World of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). It allows a BLE central device to control the LED on the mainboard and receive button press notifications.

descriptors.name: bt_dosimeter_sensor
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Dosimeter (Sparkfun Type 5) - Sensor
descriptors.description: This application uses the dosimeter (Sparkfun Type 5) to measure the radiation level of the ambient space and the report this information to another device that place outside of the radioactive zone.

descriptors.name: bt_dosimeter_client
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Dosimeter (Sparkfun Type 5) - Client
descriptors.description: This application gets the information about the radiation level from the sender via BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) and then display it on the OLED for visualization. A buzzer is also used to notify users when the radiation level crosses the threshold.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bt_ancs
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Apple Notification Center Service
descriptors.description: This example demonstrates how to receive Apple Notification Center Service (ANCS) Notifications, such as phone calls, calendar events, and so on and print them out to the VCOM.

descriptors.name: bt_co_client
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - CO Monitor (MQ7) - Client
descriptors.description: This project aims to implement a CO application using Silabs development kits and external sensors integrated with the BLE wireless stack. The wireless CO system composed of a sensor and a (at least one) client device. The sensor periodically measures the CO level and advertises the processed CO level value to the Client Devices.

descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Serial Port Profile (SPP) - Server
descriptors.description: This example provides a simple template for SPP-like communication (also know as wire replacement), where Bluetooth serves as a transport channel for serial communication between server and client.

descriptors.name: bt_reporting_battery_voltage
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Reporting Battery Voltage
descriptors.description: This example shows how to create an application to monitor the battery voltage and report it as a percentage of full charge. The Bluetooth SIG defines a battery service exactly for this purpose. The definition can be found in Bluetooth SIG Specifications List. The example will use this adopted service to report battery level.

properties.value: brd4100a brd4103a brd4104a brd4161a brd4151a brd4159a brd4169a com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bt_doorlock_fingerprint
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Door Lock Fingerprint (A-172-MRQ)
descriptors.description: This example is used for a BLE-based device lock system using one Silabs EFR32xG24 Explorer kit and various hardware components such as MikroE Fingerprint Click 2 (A-172-MRQ) and SparkFun Micro OLED Breakout (Qwiic). The system is using BLE for wireless communication. This example also is the foundation to develop a secure and convenient device system using biometric authentication (fingerprint) and LED display indication. The system will use BLE for wireless communication between the Silabs board and the EFR connect mobile application.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bluetooth_hid_keyboard
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - HID Keyboard
descriptors.description: This is an example for Bluetooth LE HID device development, which can connect wirelessly to HID hosts including Windows, Mac, Android and iOS systems.

descriptors.name: bluetooth_uploading_images_to_multislots
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Uploading images to multi-slots
descriptors.description: This project shows how to implement image uploading to the bootloader storage slots using the standard OTA process. It is also extended by allowing the users to select a slot to upload to and a slot to boot from.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bt_ota_firmware_update_in_user_application
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - OTA Firmware Update in User Application
descriptors.description: This project aims to implement firmware upgrade method used in SoC-mode Bluetooth applications. A Gecko Bootloader (GBL) image containing the new firmware is sent to target device via a Bluetooth connection.

descriptors.name: bluetooth_container_level_detection_sensor
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Container Level Detection (VL53L1X) - Sensor
descriptors.description: The sensor device measures the distance between the distance sensor and the content of the container. The sensor device calculates the average distance and advertises it via BLE.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bluetooth_container_level_detection_client
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Container Level Detection (VL53L1X) - Client
descriptors.description: The sensor device measures the distance between the distance sensor and the content of the container. The sensor device calculates the average distance and advertises it via BLE.

descriptors.name: bt_em4_energy_mode_ibeacon
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - EM4 Energy Mode in iBeacon Application
descriptors.description: This code example shows the use of sleep mode EM4 in a Bluetooth iBeacon Application. The device will operate in deep sleep mode EM4 after advertising iBeacon packet in 5s. It will stay in EM4 for 15s but users can force the device to wake up from EM4 immediately by pushing Button.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

descriptors.name: bt_thermometer_with_efr32_internal_temp_sensor
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - Thermometer with EFR32 Internal Temperature Sensor
descriptors.description: This example uses the EFR32's own internal temperature sensor. This sensor is measured during the production test. The temperature readout from the ADC at production temperature as well as the Celsius value are given in the device information page.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth
